nn_fc_template:
<button type="button" class="btn btn-default allmainalerts" id="AllAlerts">All Maintenance Alerts</button>

<style>#AllAlerts {margin:4px; float:right;}</style>
<script>

var autoe = jQuery.Event( "keydown", {
    keyCode: 13
});

// On click of maint record, set as active and update table

$('#AllAlerts').click(function (e) {

	// Clear All Filters
    //$('#NETNOW_kendo-grid-widget-AID').data("kendoGrid").dataSource.filter({});
    $("#NETNOW_kendo-grid-widget-AID").data("kendoGrid").refresh();
    
    NET_NOW.dashboard.setVar('groupName', "").setVar('recordName', "").setVar('mntStartDate', "xxx").setVar('mntEndDate', "xxx").setVar('mntDurationTotal', "xxx").setVar('userTimezoneShort', "");
	NET_NOW.dashboard.updateWidgetsInClass('maintList');
    
    // Collapse Maintenance List
    $('#ASI').removeClass("in");

});

</script>
